amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of willful blindness as a defense against a charge of violating the foreign contribution ban.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of willful blindness as defense against charge of violating foreign contribution ban.

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Pickering to the Shays amendment (A002).

Pickering amendment (A010) modified by unanimous consent. A modification to prohibt willful blindness as a defense against a charge of violating the foreign contribution ban if the defendent should have known that the contribution came from a foreign national.
On agreeing to the Pickering amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 344 - 56 (Roll No. 303).
